 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/3vKmO00IoUujP1y3OvjTtQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png>

As we prepare for the leadership transition effective 1 January 2025, we’d like to share an update on the reporting lines under the new structure.

All Executive Committee (EXCOM) functions and reporting lines will remain as-is under the leadership of Michael Chalhoub, CEO of Chalhoub Group, as part of this transition. Below are key updates on reporting lines for specific roles:


Reporting to Michael Chalhoub, CEO:

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/3vKmO00IoUujP1y3OvjTtQ/550703/0A9F652388BA8CDD6DDF2E1F2D1EF92F/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-65.gif> 	
The leadership reporting line for the Strategy, Growth, Innovation & Investment (SGII) vertical and Joint Ventures (JVs) will continue as is, reporting directly to Michael.

The leadership reporting line for the Strategy, Growth, Innovation & Investment (SGII) vertical and Joint Ventures (JVs) will continue as is, reporting directly to Michael.

Kamran Abbasi, Chief Technology Officer, will join the Executive Committee, reporting directly to Michael, reinforcing our commitment to advancing technology, data, and AI across the Group.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/3vKmO00IoUujP1y3OvjTtQ/550697/628401448D480DF8307942E4CDD2B299/kamran-abbasi-3d5a5991-1.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/3vKmO00IoUujP1y3OvjTtQ/550701/3A5009213C8EBD63BFB67FCC0256D470/0v6a4100.jpeg> 	
Transform Chalhoub will be under Michael’s direct leadership, continuing its focus on driving transformation across our Group.

 


Reporting to Patrick Chalhoub, Executive Chairman:

Florence Bulte, Chief Sustainability Officer, will continue reporting to Patrick Chalhoub. This reflects our ongoing dedication to delivering on ambitious ESG priorities and creating impact together.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/3vKmO00IoUujP1y3OvjTtQ/550698/F970D9F592282B202D02B220BF426664/florence-bulte-3d5a5659-1.jpg> 	
These updates ensure a smooth transition while maintaining alignment with our strategic goals and priorities.

Thank you for your ongoing collaboration as we embark on this next chapter for Chalhoub Group.
